Title: Just BU

Title: LifeBeats
Description: LifeBeats provides creative music sessions for people with learning/physical challenges. I currently provide sessions for My Life Legacy, Thrive CIC, True Colours CIC, CORE CIC and other day-care organisations in and around Wigan delivering music sessions using colour-assisted drums, song, dance, sign language, ukulele sessions,…

Title: More Than Words
Schedule: Open Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Fridays from 9am to 4pm, and Thursdays 9am to 6.30pm
Description: Are you an aspiring actor or drama queen?  More Than Words is a not-for-profit community organisation in Wigan that supports children, young people and adults with disabilities and/or autism. We specialise in drama, music, sports and healthy living activities, but we also provide opportunities for young…
Location: Unit 2 The Edge, Pottery Terrace, Wigan, Greater Manchester, WN3 5AB, 01942 735426

Title: My Life
Schedule: Open Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm
Description: We aim to reduce social isolation and loneliness by bringing people together. With My Life, you can meet new friends, build relationships, learn new things, gain confidence, be more independent, have fun and take an active part in your local community. Location: Thompson House Equestrian Centre, Off Pepper Lane, Standish, Wigan, Greater Manchester, WN6 0PP, 01257 472 900

Title: Party Project
Schedule: Last Tuesday of each month, always 6pm-8pm
Description: PossAbilities and OV-Group have teamed up to host an inclusive pub night for adults with disabilities in our community. Our aim is to provide a fun and safe environment in which individuals are free to enjoy themselves. Filled with music. karaoke, games, prizes, laughter and…

Title: TENS 2 TEENS - ACTIVITIES IN & AROUND WIGAN
Description: This group is aimed at parents and carers of young people in and around the Wigan area. Share information on activities, events, clubs and volunteer opportunities in or around the Wigan area. Please visit their Facebook page link below for full information.
